subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: U.C. San Diego had contracted with the Patriots for the use of its facilities this week, but on Tuesday morning, Coach Bill Belichick did a reverse and moved his practices to a different campus.
snippet: U.C. San Diego had contracted with the Patriots for the use of its facilities this week, but on Tuesday morning, Coach Bill Belichick did a reverse and moved his practices to a different campus.
